resource.chars:
3.11.08
Dear Sir Archibald Geikie 
It has come to my knowledge 
that the official letter which I wrote you 
concerning the meteorological work of 
the Antarctic Expedition has <s>come <\s> been seen 
by the officials of the Geographical Society.
I wish you to know that I had no hand in this. I sent copies of the letter 
only to those persons who were directly 
concerned in the interpretations made in 
tolerance and refuted in the letter.
Its further circulation was against my 
expressed wish.
Yours very truly 
R. Scott
